summary: REQ-9/10/11 appear implemented via global purple color tokens, removal of emoji characters in favor of lucide-react icons, and updating the Home "Play Now" button to an external Meta URL with safe rel attributes. REQ-8 is only partially met: CSS references a generated background image and applies it app-wide, but the actual static asset was not added in the diff (no new files). Several unrelated changes/files also appear in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a generated/processed swirl background image as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated (background-swirls.dim_1920x1080.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The CSS references /assets/generated/background-swirls.dim_1920x1080.png, but the diff shows "Added: 0" and no new file under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the required generated image asset is not present in the change set.
evidence: <file-diff>: Added: 0, Modified: 8, Removed: 0 (no static asset added under frontend/public/assets/generated)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified a placeholder React Query hooks file despite no backend/query work being requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says no backend work is needed; adding an (empty) query hooks module is not requested by any REQ-8..REQ-11.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer adds/uses a caffeine.ai external attribution link with UTM tracking.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-8..REQ-11; BuildRequest non-goals also caution against third-party integrations beyond a simple external link (this adds a new outbound referral/tracking link).

hallucinated_features.description: Changed HTML document title to "RedVelvet Productions".

hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested by REQ-8..REQ-11 (requirements only call for purple text styling and background application, which can be done without changing tailwind.config.js).

hallucinated_features.description: Routing/layout refactor in App.tsx using TanStack Router layout + Outlet.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-8..REQ-11 (those focus on styling/background, emoji removal, and Play button behavior).
